bibl.title: The Antinoopolis Papyri. Part III.

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Barns J.W.B. and H. Zilliacus (edited with translations and notes by), The Antinoopolis Papyri. Part III. (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 47.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1967, xii-206 pp. et 2 pll.

C.R. par Claire Préaux, ChrEg 42 (1967) No. 84, pp. 407-412. - Jean Bingen, BibO 25 (1968) pp. 341-342. - Jean Irigoin, REG 81 (1968) pp. 246-247. - Ulrich Fleischer, Gnomon 41 (1969) pp. 640-646. - E. Martínez Borobio, StPap 8 (1969) pp. 128-129. - Peter J. Parsons, CR N.S., 20 (1970) pp. 86-87. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 85 (1968) pp. 441-443.
